school.title: Fire Protection Equipment Check
school.content: Check all extinguishers, sprinklers, and fire alarms in classrooms, hallways, and staff areas.
checklist: Fire extinguisher inspection date is valid

school.title: Accessibility Facility Verification
school.content: Ensure all entrances, restrooms, and common areas comply with accessibility standards.

apartment.title: Fire Safety Inspection
apartment.content: Inspect fire alarms, exits, and extinguishers in all units and hallways.
checklist: Smoke detectors in each unit are functional
Fire extinguishers checked within last 12 months
Emergency exit signage is visible and lit

commercial.title: Freight Circulation Check
commercial.content: Ensure loading/unloading areas and paths are clear and compliant.
